Storage of Paper Copies of Service Records
In order to prevent loss of or damage toÂ paper
copies
of service records, RACCs must
store them in
VA Form 21-4582
, and
file them down in the center section of the appropriate claims folder.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Restricted Records Storage and Control
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
